basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Aerococcus viridans (MIC=1.9-2.92 µM), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=1.9-2.92 µM), Bacillus megaterium (MIC>50 µM), Saphylococcus aureus (MIC>50 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli 363 (MIC=22-33 µM), Vibrio vulnificus (MIC>50 µM), Salmonella thyphimurium (MIC>50 µM), Klebsiella pneumoniae (MIC>50 µM).Fungi:Fusarium oxysporum (MIC=0.84-1.26 µM), Botrytis cinerea (MIC=4.38-6.57 µM).
